constraints.name: ceiling_lamp_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that at least one ceiling lamp exists in the scene

constraints.name: bed_presence
constraints.description: Verifies that at least one bed (double_bed, single_bed, or kids_bed) exists in the scene

constraints.name: ceiling_lamps_above_bed_corners
constraints.description: Checks that ceiling lamps are positioned directly above the four corners of the bed in the XZ plane, with appropriate vertical positioning near the ceiling height

constraints.name: four_ceiling_lamps_required
constraints.description: Verifies that exactly four ceiling lamps are present (one for each corner of the bed)
